name: Dirt Cake
author: Anna Rose Bles

ingredients.name: (3.5 oz.) instant vanilla or French vanilla pudding

instructions: Crush cookies and put half of crumbs in 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix cream cheese and butter until smooth. Mix in powdered sugar. Fold in whipped topping. In separate bowl, mix pudding, milk and vanilla. Fold cream cheese mixture and pudding mixture together. Pour into pan on cookie crumbs. Sprinkle remaining crumbs on top.
